title: Related rates with area of triangle

content.question:
If the base b of a triangle is increasing at a rate of 3 inches per minute while its height h is
decreasing at a rate of 3 inches per minute, which of the following must be true about the area A of the triangle?

choices.label: A is decreasing only when b<h.
A is decreasing only when b>h.

content.answer: A is decreasing only when b>h.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
